title: Gambling Platforms
description: Worked as a UI developer on Sportsbook, Casino, eSports, and Slots Platforms, using AngularJS, CSS, and GitHub within agile teams. Contributed to front-end product design, delivering responsive, engaging interfaces and troubleshooting UI issues for high-traffic gambling products.

title: Argyll & Bute Council
description: I contributed to the front-end development of a SaaS platform for council and public sector websites, delivering accessible, responsive interfaces. Collaborated with designers and back-end teams while troubleshooting UI issues and fixing bugs using XML and jQuery.
